section2.title: What is Milvus
section2.content: Milvus is an open source similarity search engine for massive-scale feature vectors. Built with heterogeneous computing architecture for the best cost efficiency. Searches over billion-scale vectors take only milliseconds with minimum computing resources. Milvus can be used in a wide variety of scenarios to boost AI development.

list.title: Heterogeneous computing
list.content: Milvus is designed with heterogeneous computing architecture for the best performance and cost efficiency.

list.title: Multiple indexes
list.content: Milvus supports a variety of indexing types that employs quantization, tree-based, and graph indexing techniques.

list.title: Intelligent resource management
list.content: Milvus automatically adapts search computation and index building processes based on your datasets and available resources.

list.title: Horizontal scalability
list.content: Milvus supports online / offline expansion to scale both storage and computation resources with simple commands.

list.title: High availability
list.content: Milvus is integrated with Kubernetes framework so that all single point of failures could be avoided.

list.title: Ease of use
list.content: Milvus can be easily installed in a few steps and supports Prometheus-based GUI monitor dashboards.

section5.title: Scenarios
section5.desc: Step-by-step instructions to solve AI problems with Milvus.

img1.title: Reverse Image Search
img1.content: High-performance, customizable reverse image search system built with the VGG neural network model

img2.title: Personalized Recommender System
img2.content: High-performance recommender system built with the PaddlePaddle deep learning platform

img3.title: Chemical Structure Similarity Search
img3.content: High-performance similarity search of massive-scale chemical structures
